description: For creating folders inside foundry to store compendium packs defined in the package json file.

name.description: The name of the folder to create.

sorting.description: A single letter code to declare to sort Alphabetically: a, or Manually: m

color.description: The RGB hash value of the color you want to set the folders to.

packs.description: An array of packs declared in the package json that are to be stored in this folder.

items.description: The unique identifying name of the pack to be stored inside the folder.
